body:
Harigane shinshi really nails it, or doesnt. He nailed it here, with a noticable and appreciated absense of soggy droopy breasts and intercourse via deformed anus. Facial emotions and the heroine's stances really convey the message through the language barrier, as we thrn to appreciate the great artistic liberties taken with this piece, examples being changes in sexual positions, x-ray depiction of internal cummage, and pupil constrictions when she visibly recoils from having a dick between her hips.
Overall 7/2 pretty average
